TraviAnt

This bot is a fun project which I'm developing out of boredom. Create an account below and login with same credentials.




Download

WARNING: By using this software you violate Travian GmbH ToS rules. I'm not responsible for any harm done by using this software.

UYARI: Bu programı kullanaraktan Travian GmbH kullanım sözleşmesini ihlal edersiniz, programın kullanımından doğacak herhangi bir yazılımsal veya hukuksal sorunlardan kendiniz sorumlusunuz!


Release notes and user guide (17/8/2019):
  • Attack option is not working for now.
  • Create farmlist feature selects Farm villages from Natars profile (first 300)
    In order to make this work you have to create at least 3 farmlists and add each of them at least 1 farm.
  • If your Barracks get destroyed, it will automatically try to build it again and continue to farm!
  • Buy resources starts to buy free resources every 6 minutes, then automatically NPC and trains troops with those resources. Cool huh?

    • If you have any questions you are welcome to the Discord server.

    After first installation, updates will be done automatically.

    Discord Server
